classification: Tools, Equipment and Utilitarian Objects; Ceremonial Objects
creditline: Gift of Mr.and Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
description: carved rhinoceros horn libation cup; in form of a Ho-Ho bird holding a cup on his back; the handle is carved in the form of a dragon, conventionalized star and Chinese Yang-Yin symbol form a band around the rim; there is a small conventionalized dragon resting on the inside of the cup; carved wood base
title: Libation Cup with Base
